title: The English Presbyterian and Independent reconciled Setting forth the small ground of difference between them both.
author: An English gentleman, a well-willer to the peace of his country.
publisher: printed for Edward Brewster at the sign of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Other editions of this work are attributed to "An English gentleman, a well-willer to the peace of his country".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
